concept.title: Running the html5 plugin
concept.shortdesc: The html5 plugin can be run as a regular DITA-OT plugin.

conbody.p: To run the plugin, you must be familiar with the process of running the DITA-OT. Refer to the . The transtype is d4p-html5 to prevent conflict with the html5 transtype, available in the DITA-OT version 2.0.
The plugin works with DITA-OT versions 1.7.x and prior.

The plugin uses ant parameters similar to those for the xhtml transform. Some parameters available for the xhtml transform are not currently supported in the html5 plugin. For a complete list of available properties, consult the reference material."reference material" needs clearer identification, and a link.

section.title: Running DITA-OT from Ant
section.p: Execute the usual command using html5 as the transtype.
